| HistoryText             = A group of [[Rhesus Macaque]] [[Monkeys]] artificially evolved by [[George Tarleton (Earth-616)|M.O.D.O.K.]] to act as a cheaper alternative to hired [[Advanced Idea Mechanics (Earth-616)|A.I.M.]] minons.

The A.I.Monkeys acted as M.O.D.O.K. henchmen in a series of heists across [[Puerto Rico]] only for them to be foiled by the combined efforts of the vacationing [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]] members [[Reed Richards (Earth-616)|Mister Fantastic]] and [[Susan Storm (Earth-616)|Invisible Woman]] and local Puerto Rican hero [[Miguel Rodriguez (Earth-616)|El Vejigante]].{{r|Fantastic Four in ¡Ataque del M.O.D.O.K.! Vol 1 1}}

| Equipment               =

| Notes                   = * A comment by M.O.D.O.K. implies that the later evolved A.I.Monkeys are more intelligent. That comment along with the fact that the lead monkey (and smartest) is numbered [[Agent 94558 (A.I.Monkeys) (Earth-616)|94558]], it seems likely that M.O.D.O.K. created at least 94558 A.I.Monkeys.{{r|Fantastic Four in ¡Ataque del M.O.D.O.K.! Vol 1 1}}
